overview: Take a blow-up pool, a hose and throw in Alina and Eliza and you've got the makings of one of the sexiest girl/girl scenes ever! Aiden sneaks up on Charlotte and soaks her with a water gun; now it's Charlotte's turn to get her friend all wet. Big breasted beauties Natasha and Krissy are eager to worship every inch of each others bodies. An afternoon in bed is anything but relaxing for Isabella and Reena as they feast on each other's wet slit!
title: Her Forbidden Fruit 2
